entities.name: INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE
entities.description: The Internal Revenue Service (IRS) is the revenue service for the United States federal government, responsible for collecting taxes and administering the Internal Revenue Code.

entities.name: BOARD
entities.description: The Board refers to the governing body responsible for making decisions on the company's dividend program and other strategic financial decisions.

relationships.relationship_description: The Board's decisions may be influenced by tax regulations and examinations conducted by the Internal Revenue Service.
